title: Chapter 37
body:
Chapter 37


After hanging up the phone, Yang Ming scratched his head in bewilderment. He then saw a Wechat message notification popped up on his phone, “I’m going back today…” Meanwhile, Liu Sha who had appeared beside him was gazing at his face.


At last, Yang Ming still brought Liu Sha back to his home. That place called home, was no longer that in which he lived together with his sister. Ever since he opted for staying with Li Xiaodan, he had been separated with her. Thus, Yang Xixi was now living together with Xu Jing.


Before wrapping up the story, Su Li had perfectly portrayed the yuri relationship between Yang Xixi and Xu Jing. It was so beautiful and harmonious. Some readers had even visioned that, Yang Ming’s betrayal was completely acceptable, as long as Yang Xixi and Xu Jing could be together forever. Tons of female readers who had penchant for yuri had joined the party as well, but not for the scumbag hero of course. They were here for the innocent and delightful yuri plots.


When Yang Ming reached home, he discovered the kitchen was in a huge mess all over the floor. A disgusted look instantly showed on his face. He could do nothing but to clean up the entire mess.


Just as he was done with cleaning, the doorbell rang. He rushed out from the kitchen just to hear a crisp sound of face-slapping. Ah, it seemed that Li Xiaotong who possessed an ultimate six sense had returned to Yang Ming’s house. After noticing the door was opened by Liu Sha, out of fury, she slapped Liu Sha’s face viciously!


Upon seeing Yang Ming, with an agitated face, she bawled, “Why is this shameless b*tch here!”


Yang Ming was flurried, “Xiao Tong, why did you…”


“What why? I’m asking why would you rather be with her!” Li Xiaotong yelled at Yang Ming while pointing at Liu Sha.


“This… This is…” Yang Ming faltered.


“Go away Liu Sha! Stop pestering Ah Ming!” Li Xiaotong almost pushed the silent Liu Sha out of the door.


“Oh come on, Xiaotong!” Yang Ming hurriedly pushed Li Xiaotong away, and stood in front of Liu Sha.


“What did I do wrong? What kind of relationship is this? I’m pregnant with your baby! How could you do this to me?”


“This…”


“Ah Ming, you don’t love Liu Sha anymore, do you?”


“Ah… This…”


“Tell me you didn’t ask her to come. She did all of this on her own. Am I right?”


“Sha… Shasha she did nothing.”


“Bullsh*t! Liu Sha, you’re the one who asked him to bring you home, aren’t you?” Li Xiaotong turned to question Liu Sha, “Go away! You go away!”


Liu Sha who had remained silent finally countered, “Aren’t you the one who seduced brother Ming? Li Xiao Tong! You thought of taking my brother Ming away just by doing that to him?”


“No! Ah Ming and I love each other for real. We are soulmates since we were kids!” Li Xiaotong said aloud.


“That’s just your wishful thinking!”


“Shut up! Stop your nonsense!”


“I’m unlike you, I’m generous. To me, it’s common for a guy to have several girlfriends at once. How bad could it be? My dad has gotten three mistresses for himself too… For brother Ming, I’ll be considerate…” Missy Liusha taunted her in a sarcastic and gentle tone. At the same time, she grabbed Yang Ming’s hand and leaned on his chest, then looked into his eyes affectionately.


Yang Ming was deeply moved by Liu Sha. He recalled the previous Liu Sha. She was a tsundere girl and often bit his head off. But now, she had changed so much for him. What was this if it wasn’t love?


Gazing at each other, their faces were getting closer and closer. Then they started kissing right in front of Li Xiaotong!


At the sight of this unscrupulous duo, Li Xiaotong was crumbling. Little did she know that, this was exactly the feeling of Yang Xixi while catching her making out with Xixi’s beloved brother. Sigh, another girl had fallen into the trap to this unfaithful hero…


It was just that, this time the loser who ran away from Yang Ming’s house was Li Xiaotong instead. She kept mumbling to herself, “How could this be? He said I’m his whole world when we made love! I’m the first girl he kissed. I’m the first girl he slept with. I should be his first until the end! But why? How could it turn out to be like this?”


Li Xiaotong could not stop recollecting the memories during her days with Yang Ming. Eerily, the last to appear in her mind was the apathetic face of Xu Jing!


That night, Li Xiaotong was almost sleepless. She was woken up by her phone’s vibration. It was a Wechat message. Realizing the message sender was Yang Ming was akin to seeing a silver lining for her. She kept her hopes high while opening the message, but just to see such contents —


Shasha will introduce you a good hospital which she knows well. The earlier you abort the baby, the lesser pain your body will suffer.


Li Xiaotong looked at this Wechat message incredulously. Holding her tummy, she went down in the dumps.


Quite the contrary, Yang Ming continued to attend school normally, as if nothing had happened. He actually felt that he had taken a load off his mind. Just as he stepped into the classroom, a Wechat message was sent by Li Xiaotong — I’ve something to tell you face to face. Let’s go to your house, just the two of us.


Finally, Yang Ming cracked a relieved smile. It occurred to him that Li Xiaotong would willingly abort the baby. He even shared this happy news with Liu Sha. He rejoiced, “Today onwards, I would always be together with my dearest Shasha. In my eyes, there would only be Shasha, forever…”


The couple again kissed on a whim.


From a nearby lonely corner, Yang Xixi was staring wistfully at her brother who was amid kissing. After that, She hugged Xu Jing who was beside her, and kissed her lips aggressively. Xu Jing naturally responded to her kiss with an intense enthusiasm. In fact, she was reconciled to be the substitute for Yang Ming as everything was happening accordingly to her script. Once Yang Ming was gone, Yang Xixi would belong to her forever, wouldn’t she?


Not until the twilight, Yang Ming met Li Xiaotong in his house. He was sitting there, and questioned with expectations, “So how? Made up your mind? You gotta believe Shasha…”


Li Xiaotong looked down, smiling. Her eyes looked incredibly sombre now. After remaining speechless for a long while, Yang Ming started to be on pins and needles. He broke the silence, “Let me make you some tea…”


“I will do that.” Li Xiaotong croaked. Then she leisurely walked to the kitchen.


Yang Ming frowned and lamented. He could feel that Li Xiaotong still was not into the idea of child abortion. What a headache! It seemed that he had to contemplate a way to convince her with his signature “tenderness and kindness”.


Li Xiaotong was standing in the kitchen. Her eyes were suddenly caught by a rubbish bag filled with food waste. These were all the dishes she had purposely cooked for Yang Ming. Covering her mouth, her eyes seemed to be overflowed with sadness. She took out her phone and sent Yang Ming such a message, “I’m sorry… Goodbye.”


Just as Yang Ming was puzzled at reading the peculiar message, Li Xiaotong popped up behind him with a kitchen knife in her hand. Argh! Yang Ming was stabbed viciously on the back!


Yang Ming fell backwards laying on the ground. Li Xiaotong sat on his body and held the knife tightly between her two hands. Then, she continued to stab him, again and again. Each and every attack brought back to her a piece of sweet memories she once had with Yang Ming. She cried aloud, “You’re so cruel! Don’t you ever think of living happily with Liu Sha!”


The body was horribly wounded!


The blood splattered in all directions!


The scene greatly satisfied the audience!


A grimace of extreme pain had contorted Yang Ming’s face. He goggled at Li Xiaotong in total disbelief. Never could he have thought that, she would do something like this!


Li Xiaotong stabbed Yang Ming continuously, until he was utterly dead, in a pool of blood…


Back to reality, Su Li was smiling arrogantly and breathing heavily; her paintbrush was flying across the draft papers in madness. Meanwhile, her manga work office was playing a japanese song named “Kanashimi no Mukou e”. This is pretty much a niche song. At first, it was supposed to be the interlude song of a game, but the game was cut off in the middle. Some corporate executives had arbitrarily reckoned that this game would induce losses to the company, yet arouse uproars among the gamers.


“Kanashimi no Mukou e” —


しみのこうへと,りけるなら (If I can make my way to the other side of sorrow)


はもうらないよ,ぬくもりもも (Then I don’t need warmth or tomorrow anymore)


のに,いりたは (The dream that landed in the darkness of silence)
